name: Zela Ultra Marathon 2024
description:
The Zela Ultra Marathon | Masters World Skyrunning Championships, event is organized by
Spotcriavo Eventos in collaboration with the municipality of Vouzela and other local entities.
The Event will take place on the 13th and 14th of April 2024, starting and finishing in Vila
de Vouzela, and will consist of 2 Skyrunning routes, a modality protected in Portugal by the
Camping and Mountaineering Federation of Portugal, and internacionally by ISF.

Day 13th April
Zela Ultra Marathon – 55 km – 3500 d+

Day 14th April
Zela Skyrace – 37 km – 2500 D+

Zela Marathon 2024

.
